General.Name: Vardhman Special Steels Limited
General.Description: Vardhman Special Steels Limited manufactures and sells billets, steel bars, and bright bars of various categories of special and alloy steels in India and internationally. It serves engineering, automotive, tractor, bearing, and allied industries. The company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Ludhiana, India.

4.Name: Mr. Rajendar Kumar Rewari B.Sc., LLB, MEP, PGDPM
4.Title: CEO & Exec. Director
